content.query:
StormEvents
| sort by DamageProperty_1 desc
| take 10

StormEvents
| sort by StartTime desc 
| project StartTime, EndTime, State, EventType, DamageProperty, EpisodeNarrative
| take 20

StormEvents
| summarize event_count=count(), mid = avg(BeginLat) by State
| sort by mid
| where event_count > 1800
| project State, event_count
| render columnchart

StormEvents
| sort by DamageProperty_1 desc
| where DamageProperty_1 > 5000
| project StartTime, State, EventType, DamageProperty_1, Source
| take 10
